import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get view filters"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/views/{entityTypeId}/{viewId}/filters"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the resolved filters for a view and entity type, combining the saved view definition with entity metadata. Use this to see the effective filter clauses that will be applied when the view runs.

**Prerequisites**
1. **entityTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/sites/\{siteUrl\}](/docs/api/sites/get-site-by-url) and read `Item.Settings.EntityTypes` for the module you are working with.
2. **viewId** - Obtain from [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views), [GET /api/v1.0/assets/views](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-views), [GET /api/v1.0/users/views](/docs/api/users/list-user-views), or [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites](/docs/api/views/list-site-views).

**Workflow Example**
1. Get entity type ids: [GET /api/v1.0/sites/\{siteUrl\}](/docs/api/sites/get-site-by-url) -&gt; capture the module's EntityTypeId.
2. List views and select a viewId.
3. Call [GET /api/v1.0/views/\{entityTypeId\}/\{viewId\}/filters](/docs/api/views/get-view-filters) to retrieve resolved filter clauses.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `entityTypeId` (path), `viewId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"entityTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Entity type identifier for the filters requested.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"b3f792ef-272b-4591-867a-357474046cdd"},{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"View identifier to resolve filters for.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

properties"},"Metadata":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"string"},"nullable":true,"description":"Key-value metadata pairs"},"Errors":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"A non-fatal validation error that did not prevent the operation from completing","properties":{"Field":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Name of the field with the validation issue"},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the validation issue"},"Code":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Machine-readable error code"}},"required":["Message"],"title":"SoftValidationError"},"description":"List of soft validation errors"}},"required":["Item","StatusCode"],"title":"ItemGetResponse"},{"type":"object","properties":{"Item":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Universal filter structure used across all search endpoints (Tickets, Assets, Users). Each FilterMatch targets a specific facet and provides criteria through either the `Id` field (for entity references) or the `Value` field (for expressions).\n\n## Supported Entity Types\n\n| Entity | Facet Key Reference | Total Facets |\n|--------|---------------------|-------------|\n| Tickets | `TicketSearchFacetKey` | 103 |\n| Assets | `AssetSearchFacetKey` | 75 |\n| Users | `UserSearchFacetKey` | 41 |\n\n## Field Usage by Facet Type\n\n| Facet Type | Use Field | Example |\n|------------|-----------|--------|\n| Entity reference (status, agent, location) | `Id` | `{\"Facet\": \"status\", \"Id\": \"guid-here\"}` |\n| Date expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"createddate\", \"Value\": \"range:thisweek\"}` |\n| Numeric expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"purchasedprice\", \"Value\": \"numoperator:greaterthan:100\"}` |\n| Keyword search | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"keyword\", \"Value\": \"laptop\"}` |\n| Boolean facet | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"isurgent\", \"Value\": \"true\"}` |\n\n## Filter Combination Logic\n\n- **Default (AND)**: All filters are combined with AND logic\n- **OR within groups**: Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR logic\n- **Exclusion**: Set `Negative: true` to exclude matching records\n\n## Expression Syntax Reference\n\nSee `DateExpressionSyntax` and `NumericExpressionSyntax` schemas for detailed syntax documentation.\n\n## Universal Facets\n\nSix facets are shared across all search endpoints: `grade`, `location`, `locationtype`, `role`, `source`, `user`. See `UniversalFacets` schema for detailed cross-entity behavior documentation.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"The facet key identifying the filter type. Valid values depend on the entity being searched:\n- Tickets: See `TicketSearchFacetKey`\n- Assets: See `AssetSearchFacetKey`\n- Users: See `UserSearchFacetKey`\n\nRetrieve available facets via `/api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/{entityTypeId}`.","example":"status"},"FacetName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Human-readable display name for the facet. Populated by the UI when saving filters.","example":"Ticket Status"},"Name":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display label for the selected value. Populated by the UI for saved filters.","example":"Open"},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID value for entity-reference facets. Use this field when filtering by a specific entity's identifier (e.g., status ID, location ID, user ID).","example":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555"},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"String value for expression-based facets. Syntax varies by facet type:\n- Date facets: See `DateExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `range:thisweek`, `date>=01/01/2024`)\n- Numeric facets: See `NumericExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `numoperator:greaterthan:100`)\n- Keyword: Plain text search term\n- Boolean: `true` or `false`","example":"range:thisweek"},"Negative":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"When `true`, excludes records matching this filter instead of including them. Inverts the filter logic.","example":false},"GroupIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0,"description":"Groups filters for OR logic. Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR, then groups are combined with AND. Default value of 0 means all filters use AND logic.","example":0},"Selected":{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"Indicates the filter is active. Always `true` when applying filters via API.","example":true},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the custom field type when this filter targets a custom field. Used with facets like `usercustomfield`, `assetcustomfield`, or `ticketcustomfield`."},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Path identifier for complex editor configuration. Used when the filter requires a specialized UI editor component."},"SortOrder":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Sort order hint for display purposes when presenting multiple filter options."},"AggregateOperation":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"enum":["and","or"],"description":"Logical operation for aggregate filters. When set, this filter acts as a container combining `Children` filters with the specified operation. Use `and` to require all children match, `or` to match any child."},"Children":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Nested filter conditions for aggregate filters. Only used when `AggregateOperation` is set. Allows building complex nested filter expressions.","items":"circular(FilterMatch)"}},"required":["Facet"],"example":{"Facet":"status","FacetName":"Status","Name":"Open","Id":"38889bac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00001","Negative":false,"GroupIndex":0,"Selected":true},"title":"FilterMatch"}}}}],"title":"ViewFilterMatchResponse"},"example":{"Item":[{"Facet":"location"}],"StatusCode":200}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
